name: ConnectFailures_DeleteConnectFailureLog
description:
Deletes the Connect failure log information for the specified entry.

**Note:** To use this function, you must be an account administrator and Connect must be enabled on your account.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

failureId.description: The ID of the Connect post failure. Use `all` to delete all failures for the account.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
